content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for your interest in my apartment, Hassan. I am open to discussing the rental price with you. What is your proposed rental price for the 25 square meter apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you for your proposal, Hassan. While I appreciate your interest, I am not willing to accept that rental price. I think we can come to an agreement that is mutually beneficial. May I suggest we negotiate on the rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
1,200 Euros per month?

I am open to discussing the rental price with you.

I am a responsible and dependable person and I want to be on good terms with my landlord.

I want to rent the apartment for the lowest possible price.

Please let me know if there is anything else I can do to help you.

Thank you for your time.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for your counterproposal, Hassan. While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, I am still not willing to accept that rental price. I believe that I can get more for my apartment and I want to maximize my gains as a landlord. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us. May I suggest we continue to negotiate on the rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine
